ctx: intros T U V W F G H I FF f g h Hfg Hgh Hfgh.
exceptions.tactic: apply (filterlim_comp f g G H FF Hgh).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : Type U : Type V : Type W : Type F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop H : (V -> Prop) -> Prop I : (W -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F f : T -> U g : T -> V h : U -> V -> W -> Prop Hfg : filterlim f F G Hgh : filterlim g F H Hfgh : filterlimi (fun x : U * V => h (fst x) (snd x)) (filter_prod G H) I X0 : W * W -> W X : W * W -> W H0 : forall (f g : W -> W) (h : W -> W -> W), filterlim f I I -> filterlim g I I -> filterlim (fun x : W * W => h (fst x) (snd x)) (filter_prod I I) I -> filterlim (fun x : W => h (f x) (g x)) I I The term "f" has type "T -> U" while it is expected to have type "Type".

original: intros T U V W F G H I FF f g h Hfg Hgh Hfgh. apply (filterlim_comp_2 f (fun x y => h (fst x) (snd x)) F G H I Hfg). apply (filterlim_comp f g G H FF Hgh).
